description:
The team is one deal away from meeting their monthly goals. They are approached by a property owner who owns a hot springs inn.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Nyaan! Mokuhyoutassei made Ato Ikken! Sennen Hoshimatsuri de Negai Kanaeta Mae!
Nyan! One More Deal Until We Meet Our Goal! Let`s Make Our Wishes Come True at the Millennium Star Festival!
にゃ～ん! 目標達成まであと一軒! 千年星祭りで願い叶えたまえ!
